description.value:
This beaded pendant crafted by Lyrune-Quah shamans features an uncut moonstone that warns the wearer of danger. When a hostile creature comes within 30 feet of you, the stone glows with moonlight only you can see.

Activateâ€”Lunar Illumination 1 (concentrate)

Frequency once per hour

Effect Bright moonlight shines out of the gem in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30], forcing hostile creatures in the area to make a @Check[fortitude|dc:26] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round.
